page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content: Many activities in Millbrook area. People tend to go to local activities because of transport problems. {Group Activities.}Brownies,Cubs, Guides,Scouts,W.I,Lifesaving,Karate, Flower Arranging,Keep Fit,Twinning, Ladies Group,Angling, T.A.R.D.A, Skittles,Bingo,Tuesday Club(5-11 yrs) Darts,Mother and Toddler,Evening Classes, Art,Yoga,Stretch. Activities take place at 4 halls in Millbrook. {Outdoor Activities.}(Not always run locally).Windsurfing(Millbrook Lake), Hangliding(Whitsand Cliffs),Sailing (creek),Canoeing(lake and creek). {Football Club.}Activities on several evenings at club house.Darts,Skittles, discos,Country and Westerns,'Grab a Granny'-Wednesday afternoon,Friday evening(old time dancing),Bingo, Christmas party for members children.
